item.title: A Powerful AI Breakthrough Is About to Transform the World
item.description: The technology driving ChatGPT is capable of so much more. What’s coming next will make talking bots look like mere distractions.

item.title: Elon Musk Ramps Up Legal Fight With OpenAI, Microsoft
item.description: The billionaire accused the ChatGPT maker of anticompetitive behavior in new court filings.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on possible exceptions to Trump’s tariffs, ASML, Tencent and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Meta Fined $843 Million by EU Over Marketplace Ads Platform
item.description: The European Commission said the company tied its classified-ads platform to its flagship social network, undermining competition.
